quotes.quote: Many people are alive but don't touch the miracle of being alive.
We must learn to reawaken and keep ourselves awake
To be awake is everything.
We are awakened to the profound realization that the true path to liberation is to let go of everything.
Be fully awake if you want to dream.
Dream big while you sleep, and even bigger when you're awake.
Awake. Be the witness of your thoughts. You are what observes, not what you observe.
Mindfulness means being awake. It means knowing what you are doing.
Do not just exist, be fully awake.
To think in terms of either pessimism or optimism oversimplifies the truth. The problem is to see reality as it is.
Prove to the world that you are alive, let your words breathe life into the nostrils of the universe.
When you realize nothing is lacking, the whole world belongs to you.

Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.

Self-observation brings man to the realization of the necessity of self-change. And in observing himself a man notices that self-observation itself brings about certain changes in his inner processes. He begins to understand that self-observation is an instrument of self-change, a means of awakening.
An awake heart is like a sky that pours light.
To be awake is the refreshness of being.
It takes a person who is wide awake to make his dream come true.
Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
To be awake is to be alive.
Life can only take place in the present moment. If we lose the present moment, we lose life.
Those who are awake live in a state of constant amazement.
There is no place so awake and alive as the edge of becoming.
Arise! Awake! and stop not until the goal is reached.
Live the actual moment. Only this actual moment is life.
To awake from death is to die in peace.
Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.â€Â
Lose an hour in the morning, and you will be all day hunting for it.â€
If you really want to dream, be fully awake.
Remember that there is only one important time and it is Now. The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
